policies.name: b5629c75-5c77-4422-87b9-2509e680f8de
policies.description: This initiative includes policies that address a subset of Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) Level 3 requirements. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/cmmc-initiative.

policies.name: 1a5bb27d-173f-493e-9568-eb56638dde4d
policies.displayName: CIS Microsoft Azure Foundations Benchmark v1.1.0
policies.description: CIS Microsoft Azure Foundations Benchmark v1.1.0

policies.name: ac076320-ddcf-4066-b451-6154267e8ad2
policies.displayName: Enable Microsoft Defender for Cloud on your subscription
policies.description: Identifies existing subscriptions that aren't monitored by Microsoft Defender for Cloud and protects them with Defender for Cloud's free features.Subscriptions already monitored will be considered compliant.To register newly created subscriptions, open the compliance tab, select the relevant non-compliant assignment, and create a remediation task.

policies.name: a1181c5f-672a-477a-979a-7d58aa086233
policies.displayName: Security Center standard pricing tier should be selected
policies.description: The standard pricing tier enables threat detection for networks and virtual machines, providing threat intelligence, anomaly detection, and behavior analytics in Azure Security Center.

policies.name: ffb6f416-7bd2-4488-8828-56585fef2be9
policies.displayName: Deploy export to Log Analytics workspace for Microsoft Defender for Cloud data
policies.description: Enable export to Log Analytics workspace of Microsoft Defender for Cloud data. This policy deploys an export to Log Analytics workspace configuration with your conditions and target workspace on the assigned scope. To deploy this policy on newly created subscriptions, open the Compliance tab, select the relevant non-compliant assignment and create a remediation task.

policies.name: 689f7782-ef2c-4270-a6d0-7664869076bd
policies.displayName: Configure Microsoft Defender CSPM to be enabled
policies.description: Defender Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) provides enhanced posture capabilities and a new intelligent cloud security graph to help identify, prioritize, and reduce risk. Defender CSPM is available in addition to the free foundational security posture capabilities turned on by default in Defender for Cloud.

policies.name: 3d9f5e4c-9947-4579-9539-2a7695fbc187
policies.displayName: App Configuration should disable public network access
policies.description: App Configuration should disable public network acces
